duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain real-time embedded software with a focus on wireless and networking technologies.
Utilize strong C/C++ programming skills to implement socket programming, IPC, and publish-subscribe mechanisms.
Deep knowledge of networking protocols (TCP/UDP/IP/HTTP/SNMP/DHCP/DNS), VLANs, and routing and switching concepts.
Contribute to Agile-based development and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
